Source code for JumpScale.baselib.mercurial.hglib.error

[docs]class CommandError(Exception):
    def __init__(self, args, ret, out, err):
        self.args = args
        self.ret = ret
        self.out = out
        self.err = err

    def __str__(self):
        return str((self.ret, self.out.rstrip(), self.err.rstrip()))



[docs]class ServerError(Exception):
    pass



[docs]class ResponseError(ServerError, ValueError):
    pass



[docs]class CapabilityError(ServerError):
    pass
